name: fuckyoufriday
text: A comment left by fuckyoufriday was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by daidai, riotdejaneiro, Thorfinn, TonyHighwind, NDCaesar, Scorpio_nadir, Soilentshuggah, adelazero, GunsOfRay)

name: phoenixultima
text: Hey, don't fucking shit on the Zippo, man. Those things are badass.

name: straw
text: Not for burning one in such as pipes they aren't

name: verplanck
text: ain't that the truth.  God would use pure sunlight to torch his bowls, tuned to perfect vaporization temperature...

name: neaner
text: Speaking of, have you ever tried burning with a magnifying glass (grass, not ants)? Perfect way to conserve and feel like a Solar God at the same time.

name: caitskills
text: i have indeed done this with a giant tv screen. or some sort of something from an abandoned tv.  i am not so much technical minded as i am marijuana minded.

name: atypicaloracle
text: The problem with marijuana is that people take apart televisions to find new ways to fire up their droll and make bongs out of fucking avocados and deer antlers carved to look like the USS Enterprise.

name: rhadamanthus
text: I agree but I don't see this as a "problem". Just "awesome".

name: dumbeast
text: Right. It's not a bug, it's a feature .

name: tonyhighwind
text: This method represent perfect economy of cannabis. You get big, fat, milky hits with this method, and you get a ton of them because solar puffing makes the herb burn nice and slow. I have done this once, maybe two times, and that is enough to tell me that no amount will ever be enough. If you can swing it, it is the way to partake.

name: aperson
text: Check out all the homeboys who know how to do drugs.

name: tonyhighwind
text: Not all homeboys pack OEs and Mickey's grenades.

name: aperson
text: I fie on your opaque patios.

name: tonyhighwind
text: Do you... do you mean transparent?

name: fineoakstructure
text: Do you... do you mean patois ?

name: aperson
text: I do!

name: kaithekender
text: they think it is RAD to have DRUG ADDICTION!

name: wonelove
text:
Point your fingers at the bad guy
with the cotton-mouth and glass eyes.

name: jar
text: I find your ideas very interesting and would like to subscribe to your newsletter.

name: straw
text: For me it has got to be butane.  You get the angle right and it provides the best means for that so-sweet slow burn.

name: andrew_
text: Bobby Hill: My dad says butane is a bastard gas.

name: saint
text: a shocked phillipe avatar is the perfect punctuation for any comment.

name: tellumo
text: Personally, I always thought Hank was blowing a carbon and a couple of hydrogens way out of proportion.

name: njury
text: Not to be a dick, but it's four carbon, and ten hydrogen, wich is more than what is normally assumed to be a couple.

name: rhadamanthus
text: He's right though, butane has one additional carbon and three more hydrogens than propane. Not to be a dick to one who's not being a dick.

name: tellumo
text:
That was exactly the point--butane's a couple of hydrogens and one carbon heavier, but it's still a light alkane, nothing to raise a stink about.

(But isn't it only two more hydrogens, not three? If it is three, then you are just the person to make the appropriate edits to Wikipedia (Official Source of Those Who Want to Appear Well-Informed Without Effort).)

name: rhadamanthus
text: You are indeed correct. I was likely burnin' one myself at the time.

name: tellumo
text: heh, no problem. Glad to hear I haven't forgotten everything about organic chemistry.

name: hateandwar
text: BWAH

name: fermatprime
text: Sorry, didn't mean to startle you!

name: pez
text: butane hell of roasts your green to black much too fast  on a sunny day, if im feeling ambitious, i will use a magnifying glass. otherwise, flick yr bic

name: nutmeg
text:
have you really lit a pipe with a magnifying glass??

does that make you a HERO?

(yes.)

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Zorque, riotdejaneiro, TonyHighwind, Lumus, usversusthem, tellumo)

name: gouldgonewild
text: Everyone knows that Africa has two suns, and this is the reason for the different skin tone.

name: waldo913
text: It's more likely that the lizard dropped its tail as a defensive measure to the searing pain you caused it (which is pretty metal), but it's a cool story!

name: hipjiverobot
text: Word to your reptilian anatomical savvy.

name: goatmasterflash
text: It is not instinctual to sit patiently for searing pain, especially for a mere creature such as a lizard. Did you hold that lizard down? Did you?

name: soticoto
text: I taped it to the ground to avoid it trying to bite me to escape. I then went over the root of its tail with black permanent marker to ensure that it absorbed the heat efficiently.

name: blitztrug
text: you are Nice Pete

name: scorpio_nadir
text: "Ray, I was a lizard you burnt my tail off that one time with a magnifying glass."

name: soticoto
text: The wallpaper in my hotel corridor in hell will consist primarily of insects, slugs, and the occasional lizard.

name: aghbar
text: Damn.  It seems as though I run out of chubbies too quickly quite often.

name: aelindil
text: The complaint of many a geek's girlfriend.

name: nyu
text: Yeah, for real. A torch lighter will burn too hot and destroy the THC. Matches produce just enough heat to vaporize.

name: rhadamanthus
text: This is incorrect. Torches are not preferred because they tend to shatter cheap or damaged glass. The THC is just peachy at that (flash of) high temperature.

name: gunsofray
text: I would have Chubbied you, had you spelled Lynyrd Skynyrd correct.

name: riazm
text: I can't believe Pete doesn't own a typewriter. Typewriters are the international sign that this correspondance was created by a psychopath.

name: phy
text: That explains the first three-quarters of the 20th century.

text:
So what's that on his forehead? It looks like he got stabbed with a Chinese character or something, but I can't read it.

Also, he lost his little soul patch he had going on there.

text: Stitches.

name: norrin
text:
Who hasn't done a little Bible fan fiction now and then? No one? Nobody else has done that?

I feel terrible shame.

name: i_love_kate
text:
"Moistened virgin."

Because he had complained in the past about his virgins being too dry and flaky.

name: buttermoths
text:
"Ray Of Light"..."moistened virgin"..."Like A Virgin"...
Dear. God. I. Am. Not. A. Religious. Man. But. Please. Help. Me. See. The. Connection. Here.

No wonder Guy Ritchie's last couple of films are such tremendous pieces of crap, if his wife is gettin' mad rutty with a tubby cat in a thong.
